decoder

Class HuffmanEncodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoder.HuffmanEncodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HuffmanEncode

    public class HuffmanEncodeImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements HuffmanEncode
    This class eimplements methods in HuffmanEncode interface. A HuffmanEncodeImpl object could genegrate Huffman code from given text, return all codes, and return original message of an encoded string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HuffmanEncodeImpl(java.lang.String codeSymbol)
      Construct a HuffmanEncodeImpl object by given codeSymbol string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String allCodes()
      This method will return all the symbols and codes in code tree generated by generateHuffmanCode.
      java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String msg)
      This method will take a encoded text as string and return its original message according to symbol and code from generateHuffmanCode.
      java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String msg)
      This method will encode message by codes generated by generateHuffmanCode and return string after encoded.
      void generateHuffmanCode(java.lang.String string)
      This method will generate Huffman code from given text and return nothing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HuffmanEncodeImpl

        public HuffmanEncodeImpl(java.lang.String codeSymbol)
        Construct a HuffmanEncodeImpl object by given codeSymbol string. Each character in codeSymbol string define a code symbol. If codeSymbol is null or empty string, or contains duplicate characters, this method will throw IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        codeSymbol - codeSymbol define code symbols

    • Method Detail

      • generateHuffmanCode

        public void generateHuffmanCode(java.lang.String string)
        This method will generate Huffman code from given text and return nothing.
        Specified by:
        generateHuffmanCode in interface HuffmanEncode
        Parameters:
        string - input string to generate Huffman code

      • allCodes

        public java.lang.String allCodes()
        This method will return all the symbols and codes in code tree generated by generateHuffmanCode. For each line, if symbol is x and code is yyy, then this line will be x:yyy, with a '\n' in the end of line if this line is not the last line.
        Specified by:
        allCodes in interface HuffmanEncode
        Returns:
        all the symbols and codes in code tree.

      • encode

        public java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String msg)
        This method will encode message by codes generated by generateHuffmanCode and return string after encoded.
        Specified by:
        encode in interface HuffmanEncode
        Parameters:
        msg - the string to encode
        Returns:
        string after encoded

      • decode

        public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String msg)
        This method will take a encoded text as string and return its original message according to symbol and code from generateHuffmanCode. If input is null or empty string, or input string contain characters not in code symbol set or input string cannot be decoded because the code is not in code tree, this method will throw IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        decode in interface HuffmanEncode
        Parameters:
        msg - input string to decode
        Returns:
        original message of input
